titleInfo.title: Man in blue playing string instrument

mods.abstract: Male adult, Turkish man, composition head and arms, molded and painted features, striped rib woven shirt, cummerbund, blue felt pants, boots and vest, cylinder shape hat and head-band, golden long sword and gun, playing string, stands on square plate, manufactured doll body, costume, hand-made. Accompanying information describes as a gift from the government of Turkey. Doll head is separated from body.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: Woman playing string instrument, Man with red coat, gun, and sword, Man dressed in black playing reed instrument, Woman in blue costume with umbrella

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
